name: Asteroids Multiplayer
description:
Bring a friend and use both cannons and missiles to rid the galaxy of the asteroid menace! 

A long time ago I used to play the old asteroids game on DOS. I thought I would try to recapture that nostalgic feeling and thus attempted  to recreate the game. This is the result of that endeavour.  It is not entirely faithful as I added some extra's that I thought would make it more fun to play. 

The game allows two players to play on the same keyboard  which I think is pretty neat. 

Have fun!
